Body: Description: Greetings. I've encountered an issue where I create a list of sites in order for them to be excluded of getting blocked, but when I select that list in the CAP policy and hit apply, it goes back to empty when I check if it is still selected.

What We've Learned Updated: the issue was caused by a 5940 bug, so I told the customer what the workaround is and asked him to test
in the meantime they started experiencing server issues - it goes down once in a while
we informed the devops team, they said there are some CPU spikes which might be the culprit. since they only have 1 CPU, the sales and product team were involved
Next Steps Updated: waiting on the sales team to have a call with the customer to add 1 more CPU to their instance
Next Steps Updated: remote session with customer to go over their configuration

we informed the devops team, they said there are some CPU spikes which might be the culprit. since they only have 1 CPU, the sales and product team were involved
the extra CPU was added and the optimisation procedure was applied
Invitation updated. Attendees: Botond Biro, Guillermo Vidal
